articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC Test Match Special commentary as England host New Zealand in the first T20 at Chester-le-Street.
articles.title: England v New Zealand, first T20 – radio, clips & text

articles.description: PSV Eindhoven and Rangers are tied as they play their Champions League play-off decider.
articles.title: Champions League: PSV host Rangers in finely poised play-off return

articles.description: Follow live text updates from round two of the Carabao Cup with Chelsea and Everton among those in action.
articles.title: Carabao Cup: Build-up with Chelsea & Everton among those in action

articles.description: Britain's Lily Miyazaki faces Belinda Bencic in the US Open second round, with Iga Swiatek and Novak Djokovic also playing - radio and text.
articles.title: US Open: GB's Miyazaki in action on day three - radio & text

articles.description: Manchester City have reached a verbal agreement with Wolves over a £47.3m deal to sign midfielder Matheus Nunes.
articles.title: Man City agree £47.3m Nunes deal with Wolves

articles.description: British qualifier Lily Miyazaki's memorable US Open run ends with a second-round exit against Olympic champion Belinda Bencic.
articles.title: Miyazaki's memorable US Open run ended by Bencic

articles.description: England captain Jos Buttler makes "one of the all-time terrible reviews" after appealing for an lbw decison against New Zealand in the first T20 at Chester-le-Street.
articles.title: 'One of the all-time terrible reviews' Buttler wastes England review

articles.description: Seventh seed Stefanos Tsitsipas suffers a shock defeat by Dominic Stricker in the second round of the US Open.
articles.title: Tsitsipas stunned by world number 128 Stricker

articles.description: Monaco complete the £35m signing of striker Folarin Balogun from Arsenal on a five-year deal.
articles.title: Monaco sign Balogun for £35m from Arsenal

articles.description: England's men and women will receive the same money in match fees for internationals with immediate effect.
articles.title: England men and women to be paid same match fees
